description.p: Gets information about an Excel file.

prototypes.prototype: dim result as p = a5_analyzeExcelFile(filename as c [, samplesize as N]);

description.p: Default = 0. The number of records to sample in the sheet. By default, all records are loaded.

discussion.p: The a5_analyzeExcelFile() function can be used to return the number of sheets in an Excel file

page.example:
dim fn as c = "C:\excelfiles\myExcelDoc.xlsx";
?a5_analayzeExcelFile(fn).sheetnames = people companies products
